RainbruRPG::Terminal::Caption

RainbruRPG::Terminal::Caption Class Reference

#include <caption.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Terminal::Caption:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Class used by some Widget to draw their text.

The text can be :

  • H_CENTERED : The text will be centered horizontally between xPos and xPos+width;
  • V_CENTERED : The text will be centered vertically between yPos and yPos+height;
  • HV_CENTERED : The text will be centered horizontally and vertically;
  • SCROLLED : The value of xOffset and yOffset will be used to scroll the text.

void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Caption::drawHCentered (  )  [private]

Definition at line 237 of file caption.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Caption::drawWordWrapped (  )  [private]

Draw a word wrapped caption.

It draws each word of the text property individually (by using the getWord() function) only if it do not override the caption's width. If the word can stand this limit, it is writtent in a newline.

The number of lines used is not tested.

Definition at line 274 of file caption.cpp.

string RainbruRPG::Terminal::Caption::getWord (  )  [private]

Get the first word of the text property and erase it.

This function is used to draw the word wrapped text.

Returns:
the next word to word-wrap

Definition at line 251 of file caption.cpp.

Member Data Documentation

int RainbruRPG::Terminal::Caption::xOffset [private]

The x offset where we start to draw the text.

If superior to 0, the number of letters defined by this value will not be visible.

Definition at line 114 of file caption.h.

int RainbruRPG::Terminal::Caption::yOffset [private]

The y offset where we start to draw the text.

If superior to 0, the number of lines defined by this value will not be visible.
